jsdp.sdp

Class TransitionProbability

  • java.lang.Object
    • jsdp.sdp.TransitionProbability
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BR_TransitionProbability, sS_TransitionProbability, TransitionProbabilityImpl, TransitionProbabilityImpl

    public abstract class TransitionProbability
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstraction to capture the stochastic decision process transition probabilities.
    Author:
    Roberto Rossi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TransitionProbability() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract java.util.ArrayList<State> generateFinalStates(State initialState, Action action)
      This method constructs an ArrayList<State> of states towards which the stochastic process may transition in period t+1 if action is selected in initialState at period t; note that these states may not yet exist in the state space.
      abstract java.util.ArrayList<State> getFinalStates(State initialState, Action action)
      This method retrieves an ArrayList<State> of existing states towards which the stochastic process may transition in period t+1 if action is selected in initialState at period t.
      abstract double getTransitionProbability(State initialState, Action action, State finalState)
      This method returns the transition probability from initialState to finalState when action is selected.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TransitionProbability

        public TransitionProbability()

    • Method Detail

      • getTransitionProbability

        public abstract double getTransitionProbability(State initialState,
                                                Action action,
                                                State finalState)
        This method returns the transition probability from initialState to finalState when action is selected.
        Parameters:
        initialState - the initial state.
        action - the action chosen.
        finalState - the final state.
        Returns:
        the transition probability from initialState to finalState when action is selected.

      • generateFinalStates

        public abstract java.util.ArrayList<State> generateFinalStates(State initialState,
                                                               Action action)
        This method constructs an ArrayList<State> of states towards which the stochastic process may transition in period t+1 if action is selected in initialState at period t; note that these states may not yet exist in the state space.
        Parameters:
        initialState - the initial state of the stochastic process; note that we assume that initialState is associated with period t.
        action - the action selected at period t.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList<State> of states towards which the stochastic process may transition in period t+1.

      • getFinalStates

        public abstract java.util.ArrayList<State> getFinalStates(State initialState,
                                                          Action action)
        This method retrieves an ArrayList<State> of existing states towards which the stochastic process may transition in period t+1 if action is selected in initialState at period t.
        Parameters:
        initialState - the initial state of the stochastic process; note that we assume that initialState is associated with period t.
        action - the action selected at period t.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList<State> of states towards which the stochastic process may transition in period t+1.
